html: Don’t spend another minute down on yourself, living with regrets. God has forgiven you; forgive yourself. He’s not condemning you; He’s not pushing you down. Don't push yourself down.
text: Don’t spend another minute down on yourself, living with regrets. God has forgiven you; forgive yourself. He’s not condemning you; He’s not pushing you down. Don't push yourself down.

html: The sooner you learn to bless your enemies, to be good to people that have not been good to you, the better off you’re going to be.
text: The sooner you learn to bless your enemies, to be good to people that have not been good to you, the better off you’re going to be.

html: Joel's new book, NEXT LEVEL THINKING, is coming this October! #NextLevelThinkingpic.twitter.com/P9n4zHfCJi
text: Joel's new book, NEXT LEVEL THINKING, is coming this October! #NextLevelThinkingpic.twitter.com/P9n4zHfCJi

html: No chain is too much for our God. No addiction is too great, no cancer too big, no enemy too powerful, no person too strong. God controls the universe. Don't miss "The Chain Breaker" from Joel on Podcast! http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/8ximxUAJmq
text: No chain is too much for our God. No addiction is too great, no cancer too big, no enemy too powerful, no person too strong. God controls the universe. Don't miss "The Chain Breaker" from Joel on Podcast!  http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/8ximxUAJmq

html: You don’t have to struggle and fight to make a dream come to pass. Relax and live at rest knowing that God is unfolding His plan.
text: You don’t have to struggle and fight to make a dream come to pass. Relax and live at rest knowing that God is unfolding His plan.

html: If you’re not hungering after anything, you’re not going to be filled. Are you hungry to get well, hungry to accomplish a dream, hungry to meet the right person, hungry to go higher?
text: If you’re not hungering after anything, you’re not going to be filled. Are you hungry to get well, hungry to accomplish a dream, hungry to meet the right person, hungry to go higher?

html: Most of us know God as a savior. We know Him as a healer. We know Him as a provider. We also need to know Him as a chain breaker, as the God who looses us from bondage. Be inspired by this message from Joel, “The Chain Breaker”. Get it here: http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/gW9Z1CO8kd
text: Most of us know God as a savior. We know Him as a healer. We know Him as a provider. We also need to know Him as a chain breaker, as the God who looses us from bondage. Be inspired by this message from Joel, “The Chain Breaker”. Get it here: http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/gW9Z1CO8kd

html: When you pay someone back, it’s not hurting them; it’s hurting you. It’s keeping you from rising higher.
text: When you pay someone back, it’s not hurting them; it’s hurting you. It’s keeping you from rising higher.

html: You’ve been set free. You’re the one to set a new standard. You’re the one to defy the odds. Get in agreement with God. Freedom starts in your thinking.
text: You’ve been set free. You’re the one to set a new standard. You’re the one to defy the odds. Get in agreement with God. Freedom starts in your thinking.

html: We hope to see you at our next Night of Hope on Saturday, October 6 at @CapitalOneArena in Washington, D.C.! Click here for details: http://joel.osteen.co/NOHDC2018 pic.twitter.com/dCOYicO4f0
text: We hope to see you at our next Night of Hope on Saturday, October 6 at @CapitalOneArena in Washington, D.C.! Click here for details: http://joel.osteen.co/NOHDC2018 pic.twitter.com/dCOYicO4f0

html: Have this new perspective, “My chains are gone. I’ve been loosed.” Start living from a freedom mindset. Click here to listen to, "The Chain Breaker”: http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/8eThycnfNe
text: Have this new perspective, “My chains are gone. I’ve been loosed.” Start living from a freedom mindset. Click here to listen to, "The Chain Breaker”: http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/8eThycnfNe

html: Those things that have held you back for years, you’re not going to see them anymore. This is a new day of freedom, a new day of wholeness, a new day of increase.
text: Those things that have held you back for years, you’re not going to see them anymore. This is a new day of freedom, a new day of wholeness, a new day of increase.

html: The things that seem impossible to you, God is saying, “Look again. I’m working behind the scenes. This is not the time to get discouraged. This is not the time to let circumstances talk you out of it. You’re close to your breakthrough.”
text: The things that seem impossible to you, God is saying, “Look again. I’m working behind the scenes. This is not the time to get discouraged. This is not the time to let circumstances talk you out of it. You’re close to your breakthrough.”

html: Whatever has you bound, whatever is restricting you, God is saying, "This is your time to be free." It's not your destiny to go through life with something limiting you. Get this encouraging message from Joel, "The Chain Breaker": http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/5xlanUh2JX
text: Whatever has you bound, whatever is restricting you, God is saying, "This is your time to be free." It's not your destiny to go through life with something limiting you. Get this encouraging message from Joel, "The Chain Breaker": http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/5xlanUh2JX

html: You are made in the image of almighty God. You have seeds of greatness. You’re full of talent and creativity. You were created to be free, to accomplish your dreams. Not just to get by in life, but to excel, to leave your mark on this generation.
text: You are made in the image of almighty God. You have seeds of greatness. You’re full of talent and creativity. You were created to be free, to accomplish your dreams. Not just to get by in life, but to excel, to leave your mark on this generation.

html: In the natural you’re stuck; that’s when the chain breaker is going to show up and make things happen that you couldn’t make happen. It wasn’t your effort; it’s simply the goodness of God.
text: In the natural you’re stuck; that’s when the chain breaker is going to show up and make things happen that you couldn’t make happen. It wasn’t your effort; it’s simply the goodness of God.

html: God is releasing you to go where no one in your family has gone. You're going to accomplish dreams bigger than you’ve imagined. God is breaking chains. Watch Joel’s new message this morning on Podcast, "The Chain Breaker"! http://c.osteen.co/Vpodcast pic.twitter.com/FX0dkpYIk3
text: God is releasing you to go where no one in your family has gone. You're going to accomplish dreams bigger than you’ve imagined. God is breaking chains. Watch Joel’s new message this morning on Podcast, "The Chain Breaker"! http://c.osteen.co/Vpodcast pic.twitter.com/FX0dkpYIk3

html: You were not created to be bound by loneliness, by shame. Our God is a chain breaker. Get ready. The chain breaker is about to step in. This is a new day. Freedom is coming.
text: You were not created to be bound by loneliness, by shame. Our God is a chain breaker. Get ready. The chain breaker is about to step in. This is a new day. Freedom is coming.

html: God will use persecution, rejection, and loss to force us to change. He’s not just trying to make your life miserable; He’s pushing you into your purpose.
text: God will use persecution, rejection, and loss to force us to change. He’s not just trying to make your life miserable; He’s pushing you into your purpose.

html: We all want to be comfortable, but being in God’s perfect will, will make you a little uncomfortable.
text: We all want to be comfortable, but being in God’s perfect will, will make you a little uncomfortable.

html: Don’t miss today because you’re worried about tomorrow. Today is a gift. You can never get this day back.
text: Don’t miss today because you’re worried about tomorrow. Today is a gift. You can never get this day back.

html: Keep being your best where you are. When you prove to God He can trust you, then God will take you higher than you’ve imagined. Check out "Your Father's World" on Podcast here! http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/kt2hDu8Ef3
text: Keep being your best where you are. When you prove to God He can trust you, then God will take you higher than you’ve imagined. Check out "Your Father's World" on Podcast here! http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/kt2hDu8Ef3

html: Every difficulty you go through, every bad break, every person that leaves, isn’t meant to stop you. It’s meant to push you, to stretch you, to mature you, to make you stronger.
text: Every difficulty you go through, every bad break, every person that leaves, isn’t meant to stop you. It’s meant to push you, to stretch you, to mature you, to make you stronger.

html: Sometimes we’re praying against the very thing God has ordained, against what He set into motion.
text: Sometimes we’re praying against the very thing God has ordained, against what He set into motion.

html: God has people in positions of influence: you don’t know them, but they know you. They’re ordained to help you, to show you favor, to help you rise higher. Don't miss "Your Father's World" from Joel on Podcast! http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/W1wtD8XqOJ
text: God has people in positions of influence: you don’t know them, but they know you. They’re ordained to help you, to show you favor, to help you rise higher. Don't miss "Your Father's World" from Joel on Podcast!  http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/W1wtD8XqOJ

html: Every time you’re tempted to worry, turn it around. Thank God that He’s taking care of that situation.
text: Every time you’re tempted to worry, turn it around. Thank God that He’s taking care of that situation.

html: Some of the things we go through that we don’t understand are not going to make sense right now because we can’t see the big picture, but God knows what He’s doing. He’s positioning you so you can carry out His purpose. Trust Him knowing that He’s ordering your steps.
text: Some of the things we go through that we don’t understand are not going to make sense right now because we can’t see the big picture, but God knows what He’s doing. He’s positioning you so you can carry out His purpose. Trust Him knowing that He’s ordering your steps.

html: You may not see how it can happen, but stay faithful. Keep honoring God, and one day, you’re going to be laughing in amazement. Be inspired by this message from Joel, “Your Father's World”. Get it here: http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/u4C6ha2hEg
text: You may not see how it can happen, but stay faithful. Keep honoring God, and one day, you’re going to be laughing in amazement. Be inspired by this message from Joel, “Your Father's World”. Get it here: http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/u4C6ha2hEg

html: Worry is a thief. If you allow it, worry will rob you of your destiny. Do yourself a favor; put God back on the throne.
text: Worry is a thief. If you allow it, worry will rob you of your destiny. Do yourself a favor; put God back on the throne.

html: God’s favor on your life will cause you to accomplish more with less talent. His blessing will bring divine connections: people that will use their influence to push you forward. You won’t have to find them; they’ll find you.
text: God’s favor on your life will cause you to accomplish more with less talent. His blessing will bring divine connections: people that will use their influence to push you forward. You won’t have to find them; they’ll find you.

html: Make plans for our next Night of Hope on Friday, October 6 at @CapitalOneArena in Washington, D.C.! Click here for details: http://joel.osteen.co/NOHDC2018 pic.twitter.com/Lt9hDtmWTQ
text: Make plans for our next Night of Hope on Friday, October 6 at @CapitalOneArena in Washington, D.C.! Click here for details: http://joel.osteen.co/NOHDC2018 pic.twitter.com/Lt9hDtmWTQ

html: It says in Isaiah, “God is longing to be good to you.” What God has in store is so much bigger than what we have in mind. Listen to, "Your Father's World” on podcast! http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/r14zIbVpBa
text: It says in Isaiah, “God is longing to be good to you.” What God has in store is so much bigger than what we have in mind. Listen to, "Your Father's World” on podcast! http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/r14zIbVpBa

html: People may rule you out, they may tell you it’s not going to happen, but God has the final say. When He decides to bless you, He’s going to make something happen that you didn’t see coming.
text: People may rule you out, they may tell you it’s not going to happen, but God has the final say. When He decides to bless you, He’s going to make something happen that you didn’t see coming.

html: It’s not going to happen just because of your talent, your ability, your family. It’s the favor of God. It’s His divine purpose. Do your part and honor Him; keep Him first place.
text: It’s not going to happen just because of your talent, your ability, your family. It’s the favor of God. It’s His divine purpose. Do your part and honor Him; keep Him first place.

html: The scripture says, “It is the Father’s good pleasure to the give you the kingdom.” Get this encouraging message from Joel, "Your Father's World": http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/ZtweLUlZEw
text: The scripture says, “It is the Father’s good pleasure to the give you the kingdom.” Get this encouraging message from Joel, "Your Father's World": http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/ZtweLUlZEw

html: The odds may be against you, it seems laughable, but you’re about to experience laughter. God is about to surprise you. He’s going to make things happen that you didn’t see coming.
text: The odds may be against you, it seems laughable, but you’re about to experience laughter. God is about to surprise you. He’s going to make things happen that you didn’t see coming.

html: God is positioning you so you can carry out His purpose. In the difficult times, you have to trust Him knowing that He’s ordering your steps. He wouldn’t have allowed it to happen if He didn’t have a purpose for it.
text: God is positioning you so you can carry out His purpose. In the difficult times, you have to trust Him knowing that He’s ordering your steps. He wouldn’t have allowed it to happen if He didn’t have a purpose for it.

html: You’re not a burden to God. You’re not inconveniencing Him. You’re His prized possession. You’re the apple of His eye. Watch Joel’s new message this morning on Podcast, "Your Father's World": http://c.osteen.co/Vpodcast pic.twitter.com/yeK0H5KQqb
text: You’re not a burden to God. You’re not inconveniencing Him. You’re His prized possession. You’re the apple of His eye. Watch Joel’s new message this morning on Podcast, "Your Father's World": http://c.osteen.co/Vpodcast pic.twitter.com/yeK0H5KQqb

html: God is saying, “In My world, I do the impossible. In My world, I bring promises to pass. In My world, I take you further than you’ve imagined.” Your Father’s world is a big world.
text: God is saying, “In My world, I do the impossible. In My world, I bring promises to pass. In My world, I take you further than you’ve imagined.” Your Father’s world is a big world.

html: God promised that He’ll arm you with strength for every battle. We may not know what the future holds, but we know Who holds the future.
text: God promised that He’ll arm you with strength for every battle. We may not know what the future holds, but we know Who holds the future.

html: We all have opposition. We all have people that come against us. If you’ll keep moving forward, you’ll see God vindicate you, promote you, take you where you could not go on your own.
text: We all have opposition. We all have people that come against us. If you’ll keep moving forward, you’ll see God vindicate you, promote you, take you where you could not go on your own.

html: Worry is not going to go away automatically. It’s a decision you make. Every time you’re tempted to worry, turn it around. Thank God that He’s taking care of that situation.
text: Worry is not going to go away automatically. It’s a decision you make. Every time you’re tempted to worry, turn it around. Thank God that He’s taking care of that situation.

html: If you don’t do it for yourself, do it for those that went before you. The way to honor their legacy is to go further, to dream big. Listen to: "Don't Faint In Your Mind" on Podcast here! http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/Ztid5LiJ1T
text: If you don’t do it for yourself, do it for those that went before you. The way to honor their legacy is to go further, to dream big. Listen to: "Don't Faint In Your Mind" on Podcast here! http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/Ztid5LiJ1T

html: Don’t believe that God doesn’t hear you, that you’re wasting your time praying, believing, and standing in faith. The first day you prayed, God put the miracle in motion. You are close to seeing your promise.
text: Don’t believe that God doesn’t hear you, that you’re wasting your time praying, believing, and standing in faith. The first day you prayed, God put the miracle in motion. You are close to seeing your promise.

html: Familiarity can keep you from your destiny: what you’re used to, how you were raised, the job you’ve been at for years. Don’t let your comfort keep you from becoming who you were created to be.
text: Familiarity can keep you from your destiny: what you’re used to, how you were raised, the job you’ve been at for years. Don’t let your comfort keep you from becoming who you were created to be.

html: Make your loved ones proud. You are destined to take new ground. God has ordained that every generation increase. Check out "Don't Faint In Your Mind" from Joel on Podcast! http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/AFnmZFQjUf
text: Make your loved ones proud. You are destined to take new ground. God has ordained that every generation increase. Check out "Don't Faint In Your Mind" from Joel on Podcast!  http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/AFnmZFQjUf

html: Keep doing the right thing. Keep going to work with a good attitude. You’re not working unto people; you’re working unto God. Your job is not your source, God is your source. He’s keeping the records. Your time is coming.
text: Keep doing the right thing. Keep going to work with a good attitude. You’re not working unto people; you’re working unto God. Your job is not your source, God is your source. He’s keeping the records. Your time is coming.

html: Run your race with purpose. The saints of old are rooting for you, saying, “Stay strong. This is your time. You are well able.” Be inspired by this message from Joel, “Don't Faint In Your Mind”. Get it here: http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/GBRkR6tb1J
text: Run your race with purpose. The saints of old are rooting for you, saying, “Stay strong. This is your time. You are well able.”  Be inspired by this message from Joel, “Don't Faint In Your Mind”. Get it here: http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/GBRkR6tb1J

html: If you’re going to live in peace, it’s not going to happen by accident. It’s a decision you make.
text: If you’re going to live in peace, it’s not going to happen by accident. It’s a decision you make.

html: You are living in the day your ancestors dreamed about. They went through too much for you to get stuck where you are. They sacrificed too greatly for you to give up on what God put in your heart.
text: You are living in the day your ancestors dreamed about. They went through too much for you to get stuck where you are. They sacrificed too greatly for you to give up on what God put in your heart.

html: Next Level Thinking, is coming this October! #NextLevelThinkingpic.twitter.com/QeEQ88EblJ
text: Next Level Thinking, is coming this October!  #NextLevelThinkingpic.twitter.com/QeEQ88EblJ

html: When you’re tempted to settle, you need to look up through your eyes of faith and see your loved ones that have gone before you cheering you on. Click here to listen to, "Don't Faint In Your Mind”: http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/jABYt6UoMP
text: When you’re tempted to settle, you need to look up through your eyes of faith and see your loved ones that have gone before you cheering you on. Click here to listen to, "Don't Faint In Your Mind”: http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/jABYt6UoMP

html: People may have written you off, but God doesn’t write you off. When you hear those voices telling you that you’ve blown it, you missed your chance, that means you’re listening to the wrong voices.
text: People may have written you off, but God doesn’t write you off. When you hear those voices telling you that you’ve blown it, you missed your chance, that means you’re listening to the wrong voices.

html: When you know someone is cheering for you, it gives you an edge. You can run a little faster. You can jump a little higher. You can withstand a little more pressure.
text: When you know someone is cheering for you, it gives you an edge. You can run a little faster. You can jump a little higher. You can withstand a little more pressure.

html: Are you giving up on a dream, talking yourself out of doing something great? God is saying, "Get your passion back." Get this encouraging message from Joel, "Don't Faint In Your Mind": http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/9N53zrsWXT
text: Are you giving up on a dream, talking yourself out of doing something great?  God is saying, "Get your passion back." Get this encouraging message from Joel, "Don't Faint In Your Mind": http://c.osteen.co/Apodcast pic.twitter.com/9N53zrsWXT

html: Our relatives did great things without all the technology, without the conveniences. Now, let’s honor them by going further. Let’s leave the next generation better off than we have it.
text: Our relatives did great things without all the technology, without the conveniences. Now, let’s honor them by going further. Let’s leave the next generation better off than we have it.

html: All of heaven is cheering for you. You are not running alone. The grandstands are packed with people that believe in you. What you’re going through is not unnoticed. People that have been there and made it are rooting for you.
text: All of heaven is cheering for you. You are not running alone. The grandstands are packed with people that believe in you. What you’re going through is not unnoticed. People that have been there and made it are rooting for you.

html: Somebody prayed for you. Somebody lived a life of integrity. Somebody made sacrifices. Watch Joel’s new message this morning on Podcast, "Don't Faint In Your Mind"! http://c.osteen.co/Vpodcast pic.twitter.com/DgGG6mxu9x
text: Somebody prayed for you. Somebody lived a life of integrity. Somebody made sacrifices. Watch Joel’s new message this morning on Podcast, "Don't Faint In Your Mind"! http://c.osteen.co/Vpodcast pic.twitter.com/DgGG6mxu9x

html: Become a hero of faith. Do something great, leave your mark, let your talent shine, overcome what seems impossible. You may not see how it can happen, but you have generations cheering you on.
text: Become a hero of faith. Do something great, leave your mark, let your talent shine, overcome what seems impossible. You may not see how it can happen, but you have generations cheering you on.

html: God doesn’t make any mistakes. If you’ll stay in faith, then what belongs to you will come to you at the exact right time.
text: God doesn’t make any mistakes. If you’ll stay in faith, then what belongs to you will come to you at the exact right time.
